title: Appeals Court Upholds Maryland Assault Weapon Ban (Audio)
itunes:title: Appeals Court Upholds Maryland Assault Weapon Ban (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Adam Winkler, a professor at UCLA Law School, and Mark Graber, a professor at University of Maryland School of Law, discuss an appeals court decision to uphold Maryland’s assault weapons ban. They speak with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
